TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CacheEntryRemovedCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: The information about the cache entry that was removed from the cache.
Docs.summary: Defines a reference to a method that is called after a cache entry is removed from the cache.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheEntryRemovedCallback> delegate passes information about the removed cache entry in the form of a <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.CacheEntryRemovedArguments> object.
